name: Shank Simulator
description:
This was our very first student project we did in early 2022 for a course that did not require a demo of a game to be made. The game was never tested and put outside of Unity, and upon trying to do so, we realized that:

1) The boss is broken in the built version for unknown reasons

2) The WebGL build doesn't work.

I've still decided to upload the game as is, to see what we managed to do with very little experience and a tiny amount of time.

The text file labeled 'Debug codes' should give you a few things to play with, please enjoy!

And please watch the YouTube video to see what Shank Simulator should have been!
